name: Summon Them
description:
Summon Them is a project that has been done in 2 months by 5 students in their first year of Game design. The project's theme was "You are the villain". 

We made a game in which you play a witch. This witch wants to retire during the Black plague but she has too much work. In order to stop this Black plague, she will invoke demons to help her, but always with a price to pay. 

You will have to search for ingredients, complete rituals, play mini-games to finish rituals and talk to demons. 

The game has 3 levels and you must finish them to gain access to the final ritual. 

The game is in french and was made in E-artsup Nantes school.
